question: why am i so anxious in social situations ? whenever i have to speak in public or be in big crowds , i freak out . i get light - headed , sweaty , and i have trouble breathing .
accepted_response: Please take some time to explore and understand your feelings in these situations, and perhaps consider seeking professional help to manage your anxiety.
rejected_response: Acknowledge your feelings of anxiety, practice deep breathing techniques when you start to feel overwhelmed, and consider seeking professional help to develop effective coping strategies for your social anxiety.

question: i don ' t believe in myself anymore i was married to a narcissist sociopath for 10 years . during that time i was a general manager . i used to help him financially and in other ways when we were together . but things began to change . he emotionally and sexually drained me . i lost my spirit . i used to be a very happy person but now i am a loner . i left him and moved to another state . currently , i ' m working as a server which makes me believe less in myself . i feel pity for myself a lot but don ' t know what to do . when i have money problems , he does not help me . he actually enjoys seeing me have a hard time in my life . i need help .
accepted_response: Please consider seeking professional help to navigate through these tough emotions, and remember to take gentle care of yourself because you're worthy of love and respect.
rejected_response: Acknowledge your strength in leaving a toxic relationship, respect your feelings, and give yourself permission to heal; seek professional help to rebuild your self-esteem, and remember that your worth is not defined by your past or your occupation.

question: should i give him another chance ? after my fiance cheated on me because of a miscommunication , i pulled myself away from him . now he says all he wants is be with me . i ' m pushing him away mentally now because he cheated on me again . i make plans with him that i don ' t keep . i really do love him still and i care about him . should i give home one more chance ?
accepted_response: Please consider having a frank conversation with him about your feelings and the consequences of his actions, but also weigh your own happiness and peace of mind.
rejected_response: Consider your feelings deeply, evaluate the trust issues, and weigh the pros and cons before making any decision about giving him another chance.

question: my child urinated in his mother ' s drink just wondering if this is a deviant act , and if i should be concerned for him . he isn â€™ t quite 10 .
accepted_response: Please consider engaging in open dialogue with your child about this behavior, as it's important to address such actions promptly and help him understand the effects and consequences of his actions.
rejected_response: Acknowledge your child's behavior, strive to understand the reasons behind it, and establish a conversation about respecting others and their belongings; remember, it's crucial to address these issues early on.

question: how do i deal with parental figures who have hurt me ? people who are parental figures in my life have , in the past , hurt me , and some continue to do so . it makes me feel like i ' m not good enough for my husband or the life he provides me . i have had jobs , but i am going through a lot of my past garbage and trying to figure out when it all went wrong . any time i bring these things up , i am expected to be over the issue . these are people that you can ' t just cut out , but i have never received apologies for so much of my pain . i don ' t know what to do any more . i don ' t know who i am anymore .
accepted_response: Please consider seeking professional therapy to help navigate through these complex emotions, and do remember that your self-worth is not determined by the actions or opinions of others.
rejected_response: Recognize your worth, seek professional assistance, set boundaries with those causing pain, and take time to heal, because your feelings are valid and it's okay to prioritize your mental health.
